channel.title: Two psus in conjunction
channel.description:
hah probably a pretty nooby question, but is there any way to make 2 PSU's work in conjunction with eachother? Probably not, but that would pawn so bad :P
O and BTW, MY $1.1k system came and the psu was DOA. How much of a disappointment is that

item.title: Two psus in conjunction
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

It’s possible, but the solution would probably be more expensive than buying a bigger PSU. And before anyone replies “just splice the wires” I dare them to try it first

If you want to use 2 PSUs, why not just have 1 powering the mobo+cpu, and one powering the drives? Or some other combination you can come up with to keep things even.

EDIT: Spelling.

Read full topic
